title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on tan linen "cretonne". Serpentine grey and orange branches with grey and black leaves. Flowering garlands: two shades of dark blue, two shades of light blue, two shades of grey. Growing from branches are large maroon flowers and large lavender and orange flowers. In midst of flora is a large parrot with a maroon head, blue and green wings. Side repeat is completed by matching selvages side to side at a one-half drop repeat. Condition: soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-32.
